snippet: Humanitarian intervention is facing a crisis of legitimacy.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Michael Ignatieff contends Pres Obama's failure to obtain Congressional support for strike in Syria, along with vote against action in British parliament, indicates crisis of legitimacy for humanitarian intervention worldwide; maintains democracies have responsibility to protect civilians when they are threatened with mass killing.
lead_paragraph: Humanitarian intervention is facing a crisis of legitimacy.

headline.main: The Duty to Protect, Still Urgent
headline.print_headline: The Duty To Protect, Still Urgent

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
